comment.body:
@Lola "Create a Mixtape" button created new site, where is seen only an background image so i clicked Delete in its (0) menu.
On [main site](/mixtape.bit), i already had "Mixtape public" under "My Hubs", so i tried to add new mp3 file, it Published to peers. i clicked "nope" button on an empty dialog box. Inside my Mixtape public hub, i do not see the file, though i can see it in ZeroNet\data\17rzU1715PbkyFjumb6SaH69cf1dgZqxxh\data\users\1***

@Lola "Create a Mixtape" button created second private hub for me just now. I though it will be public hub so i can share songs with others. **I do not see add button in the private hub to add new song**. Also when one create new hub, it should mention some notice that one should return back to Mixtape. Similar like on ZeroMe hubs where user is invited to visit ZeroMe to browse posts of the hub. Maybe a hyperlink, so it is not confusing what just happened.

Mixtape public under Public Hubs redirect to the hub site, so i can not add any song. Tried to add song into my public hub, but no new song is visible via mixtape.bit when i enter that playlist. Also may be good if i can delete my hubs including data.
@Lola thank you, no, i just wanted to mention things that can confuse n00bs like me and may prevent from using the site.
I think no programmer made it yet. Though sites like ZeroTalk can be used as a classified Ad site. Payments done outside of zeronet.
Maybe you are not looking for this, but i tried https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=net.mkg20001.zeronet and it connected me to ZeroNet.
@Lola Hello, it may be handy if you describe on your github page how the browser is different and what are main advantages of using it instead of Firefox (for example).
I see the player, click play button, nothing plays, can not see any song/artist name, maybe no peer..
@Lola: yes, the player shows 0:00 out of 0:00, play button was pressed.
also to You

I am not surprised about this. Politics want/or already made them liable for the users content so they have to apply filters and AI which will censor users content, see Article 13 of the EU [Copyright directive](/1LfvE91ZF18jdG3wW62Dw7NtfTZh737KPL/?Topic:1528386725_1L4dZcDF2maSKHDy788yhxpYnBWnXadUtS/+EU+Copyright+directive+Risk+of+censorship+and+limiting+free+flow+of+the+information+in+EU+2016+2019).

When i click the button to help distribute all the songs in the playlist (actualy a hub site) i see the "Auto download big file size limit" is 1MB isn't this problem to be so low? Can the on-site function set it higher automaticaly?
i think we need less public ids so less information is lost once someone gets bored and delete the content published by that id
@styromaniac@zeroid.bit: +1 because i bet that the sites will download automatically based on users.json, but filters (mute-list, site blacklist) may not without filters.json i bet.
i also tend to rather see it negative to promote content where people are killed

unbelievable... i do not know EU anti terorist laws but i think they will terorize platforms like Facebook alot in regards of censorship like that ðŸ¤
freedom or slawery. do not censor = risks to freedom. censor = risks to freedom ;

maybe you can try this? quit zeronet, move the file, create symbolic link or hard link to the original location. Unsure if that would help you. I have not tried it so do not know which consequences it may have.

whole "data" directory can be relocated, but that is likely not what you are looking for. I remember that on Windows, symlinking an optional big file (part of one zite) also not worked, ZN not wanted to load that media file then and on MS Windows with NTFS filesystem hardlink somehow was not option as i was linking across two HDDs.
@60: it works and it is impressive number of sites. how did found/added these?

thx for useful info. i am adding yours provided 3K zite list to my proxy and if you don't mind, i will link your runtime checker script (this zerome post) from my tutorial [How to Install and run Zeronet on any Linux server like Raspberry Pi (zeronet seedbox, public proxy)](/16Go5kc2U9Ff4jeaY8kYiDEgpMYdgyboPY/?Topic:2_1L4dZcDF2maSKHDy788yhxpYnBWnXadUtS/How+to+Install+and+run+Zeronet+on+a+Raspberry+Pi+or+any+Linux+computer).
Regarding lack of RAM, maybe worth trying to ask your VPS provider if they can increase SWAP a bit.

I combined @60 list linked earlier and also @polar2 "1800 sites list" and result is [3212 sites here](/1HMLvnRWViMnuvZc5LK4Dm86sZNcSH1jdh/?Topic:1553085871_1L4dZcDF2maSKHDy788yhxpYnBWnXadUtS/3212+zeronet+sites)
@60 please kindly if possible, [adjust your post](/1HMLvnRWViMnuvZc5LK4Dm86sZNcSH1jdh/?Topic:1553085871_1L4dZcDF2maSKHDy788yhxpYnBWnXadUtS#comment_1_1Ekf2tGQLhG3iifFsuUk9RcBPx26cQmCD1)

i [tried this and failed](/1TaLkFrMwvbNsooF4ioKAY9EuxTBTjipT/?Topic:1513334954_13aB79mzuRLgDYzQthn9wzycjw77WyDXh6/ZeroMe+Unfuck), you can search for "migrate zerome site:zerotalk" on ZeroHello. please write a tutorial if you manage to migrate including your old content on the old hub being visible after migration.

zeronet is an app, i do not see it beneficial to translate it as most users does not use command line parameters. zerohello page, zerotalk, zerome is owned by nofish zeronet developer his github: https://github.com/HelloZeroNet/ . Most meaningful translation would be of zerome and zerohello: https://github.com/HelloZeroNet/ZeroHello/tree/master/languages . A asi jsi cech (podle jmena) tak podivej na [cz forum](/19Q64E6Gt67e96skgYSJejYjFRrJYyqP2t/) ;)

> "The more people get away with calling each other names or mocking people ... more they incentivize others to ... leave"

i agree. i do not think there is a way to fix this except reminding. I do this too, but mostly in my mind. It is nearly same on clearnet.
Unsure what is the reason for not-bright future of ZN, but i also see numerous flaws that can end in problems for ZN users (talking about lack of spam protection and no solid (bot protected) way the site users can participate on moderating the content)
Sounds interesting. Anyone know what will this plugin (loaded by default) mean for regular zeronet user?
not sure if you are Krixano or what is your reason to say this or leave data
ok, i bet you have good reason to do this. did you checked zeromail from me yet?

i think clearnet site will be up soon and only some users will stay/be returning on its zeronet site.
yes, whoever visit [08chan zite](/1DdPHedr5Tz55EtQWxqvsbEXPdc4uCVi9D) and not delete it after that, will help distribute texts on it (i bet the .db - database which is mandatory part of the zite, contains all the onsite texts right?). Btw. the site DB is now 3MB, just after 2 days?
:-/ you may [use VPN](/1DdPHedr5Tz55EtQWxqvsbEXPdc4uCVi9D/?:users/14r48CcSSyoNo1PNhy6uWriqpopMUfqfUX:tech:3c2b7f17-b314-4f4d-a8e3-fd0d9c9086dc) to access the site under different ISP
